mapper.sql: CONCAT(a.id) AS "id", CONCAT(a.org_id) AS "orgId", CONCAT(a.exec_unit_id) AS "execUnitId",
mapper.select: select id, admin_user_id as userId,name from cdz_charge_pot

SELECT CONCAT(a.id) as id,CONCAT(a.org_id) as orgId,b.name as orgName,a.exec_unit_id as execUnitId, e.name as execUnitName FROM t_org_exec_unit_bind a inner join t_org b on a.org_id = b.id inner join (select c.id,c.name from cp_car_park c union select d.id,d.name from cdz_charge_pot d ) e ON a.exec_unit_id = e.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id,a.id as orgId,a.name as orgName,b.exec_unit_id as execUnitId,e.name as execUnitName FROM (select * from t_org where type = 5) a LEFT JOIN t_org_exec_unit_bind b on b.org_id = a.id left join (select c.id,c.name from cp_car_park c union select d.id,d.name from cdz_charge_pot d ) e ON b.exec_unit_id = e.id
AND a.id = #{orgId}

SELECT concat(a.id) as id,concat(a.org_id) as orgId,b.name as orgName,a.exec_unit_id as execUnitId, e.name as execUnitName FROM t_org_exec_unit_bind a inner join t_org b on a.org_id = b.id inner join (select c.id,c.name from cp_car_park c union select d.id,d.name from cdz_charge_pot d ) e ON a.exec_unit_id = e.id
AND a.id = #{id}
AND b.name like concat('%',#{orgName},'%')
AND a.exec_unit_id like concat('%',#{execUnitId},'%')
AND e.name like concat('%',#{execUnitName},'%')
ORDER BY a.id desc

SELECT CONCAT(b.id) as id,CONCAT(a.id) as orgId,a.name as orgName,b.exec_unit_id as execUnitId FROM (select * from t_org where type = 5) a LEFT JOIN t_org_exec_unit_bind b on b.org_id = a.id
AND a.name like concat('%',#{orgName},'%')
AND b.exec_unit_id is not null
AND b.exec_unit_id is null
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

select a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.type, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag from t_org a where a.type <= 5 AND a.id not in (select b.org_id from t_org_exec_unit_bind b)
